pull.title: test: Avoid ConnectionResetErrors during RPC tests

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
test: Avoid ConnectionResetErrors during RPC tests

This is necessary on FreeBSD and MacOSX, at least.

See https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8834#issuecomment-250450213

issue.title: [qa] nulldummy.py: Don't run unused code
issue.body: nulldummy.py accidentally imports too much and executes unused code

issue.title: Python 3 for qa
issue.body:
Switch to Python 3 for qa tests. 

All tests pass, except for pruning. It does not look like the pruning error is related to this, I created a seperate issue for it https://github.com/bitcoinxt/bitcoinxt/issues/256.

Contains the following ports:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7744 - test_framework: detect failure of bitcoind startup
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7751 - test_framework: python3.4 authproxy compat
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7814 - [qa] Switch to py3
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7853 - [qa] py2: Unfiddle strings into bytes explicitly
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8066 - [qa] test_framework: Use different rpc_auth_pair for each node
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8139 - Fix interrupted HTTP RPC connection workaround for Python 3.5+
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8400 - [qa]: enable rpcbind_test
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8839 - test: Avoid ConnectionResetErrors during RPC tests

issue.title: Add missing pieces for PR #1692
issue.body:
This PR fixes build and test problems for PR #1692.

* Backport of change from Bitcoin upgrading `fontconfig` in `depends` to version 2.12.1.
* Another upgrade of `fontconfig` in `depends` to 2.12.6. This is needed to fix compilation error with `glibc` 2.25.
* Fix for building Qt on systems that use `pkgconf` instead of legacy `pkgconfig`.
* Backport of Bitcoin PR bitcoin/bitcoin#7814: switch to Python 3.
* Backport of Bitcoin PR bitcoin/bitcoin#8139: Fix interrupted HTTP RPC connection in Python 3.5+.
* Backport of Bitcoin PR bitcoin/bitcoin#8839: Avoid ConnectionResetErrors during RPC tests.

See individual commits for more detailed descriptions of changes and why they are needed.

These fixes work when building on modern Fedora 26.
However Travis tests may fail for now, but I know why and working on fix for old Ubuntu that Travis uses.
